channel.title: docker on Statics Must Die! - Writings by Corstijan Kortsmit

item.title: Crossing Styx - My journey into the (under)world of .NET - Part III
item.description: In the third part of the series, our adventure is slowly but surely heading to its climax. All ‘characters’ have been introduced. There’s DotNet Core, the new, misunderstood (or at least by me?) kid with a bunch of talent. Docker, the awesome supporting character that actually deserves his own movie. Surely there’ll be a spin-off! There’s the antagonist, Jenkins, who might end up working along with our main character more then either had hoped for.
